seg.quote: ...the worst thing which ever happened to me.

sense.def:
Worst
je tudi presežnik prislova
badly
.

Izraz
at worst
uporabimo, kadar na okoliščine gledamo v najbolj neugodni ali črnogledi luči.

seg.quote: At worst they are looked upon as an irritation.
He was described as forceful at best, ruthless at worst.

sense.def:
Če rečemo, da bi se nekaj lahko zgodilo
if the worst comes to the worst
, hočemo povedati, da bi se lahko zgodilo, če bi se okoliščine razvijale kar najbolj neugodno.

seg.quote: If the worst comes to the worst I'll have to sell the house.
